title: ADDED   New option to support 4K UHD (3840x2160) video (Settings->Photo and
message:
ADDED   New option to support 4K UHD (3840x2160) video (Settings->Photo and
        video settings->Force 4K UHD video). Note that 4K video isn't properly
        supported by Android API, so this option may show even if it isn't
        supported on your device. I've successfully tested this on a Samsung
        Galaxy S5 and Note 3.

No longer recycling thumbnails until we've set a new one with main_activity.updateGalleryIconToBitmap().

title: Fix for face detection not working if switched camera (this was fine in 1.4, but…
message:
Fix for face detection not working if switched camera (this was fine in 1.4, but a regression introduced since).
This was due to resetting the using_face_detection flag at start of openCamera, but only ever worked due to calling openCamera with start_preview==false on startup.
Better to move startCameraPreview() to later on.
